value:
$nMPID_サラ|It seems to me that you, too, harbor a
great sadness, Linde. But you endure,
for you are strong.

$nMPID_リンダ|The great Gotoh founded Khadein's
College Arcane as a sanctuary for
study. My father was his disciple.

$nMPID_リンダ|If this is the traditional garb of
Khadein, then the robe my father
gave me...is lovely too!

$nMPID_サラ|Staying in this castle is stifling.
Linde, let's go for a walk.

$nMPID_リンダ|The College Arcane was so important
to my father. I must do what I can to
uphold its name.

$nMPID_サラ|I am Sara. I was walking with Linde
when I heard a voice calling to me...
It wasn't your voice, though.

$nMPID_リンダ|Amazing! You're right, Sara. Together,
we're practically invincible!

$nMPID_リンダ|Garbed in the attire of Khadein, I can
channel its glory into my magic!
$nMPID_サラ|Ugh. Kicked up some pebbles...

$nMPID_サラ|I am pleased you are well. Shall we
take a walk? With Linde, of course.

I am Linde, mage of Archanea. Sara
and I have joined forces. What, this?
It's more comfortable than it looks.

$nMPID_サラ|I, the granddaughter of the
archbishop of the Loptr Church.
You, the daughter of Pontifex Miloah.$k$pI feel that fate binds us, in a way...$k$p$nMPID_リンダ|Sisters who inherited powers coveted
by many... At times, I feel I am being
crushed by the weight of this destiny.$k$p$nMPID_サラ|As do I. Power can drive people
mad. Good people, bad people—
it doesn't matter.$k$p$nMPID_リンダ|Can we escape fate? Will I become
like the Dark Pontifex, Gharnef? My
father's foe?$k$p$nMPID_サラ|No. No matter how powerful, the
individual makes the choice. Don't
you agree?$k$p$nMPID_リンダ|You're right, Sara. Even if our paths
were laid down by others, we are the
ones who walk them.
$nMPID_二人|Prepare yourself!
$nMPID_二人|Now's our chance! All right...
$nMPID_双界リンダ|I shall do it, Father!
$nMPID_サラ|Enough.
It can't be...
Be mindful.
You can do this.

• "Let's show them..."
• "True magic!"

• "We'll settle this!"
• "Together!"

• "How do you like the fashion of Khadein?"
• "I can...understand its appeal."
*sigh*
Prepare to be impressed.
There is no choice.

$nMPID_双界リンダ|Looks like the Khadein festival has
been a success! I couldn't be happier.
$nMPID_サラ|So I see. Why is that?

$nMPID_双界リンダ|It's only natural. My father was a
renowned pontifex.

The great Gotoh entrusted him with
the Aura tome...even Khadein itself!

Khadein will always have a special
place in my heart.

$nMPID_サラ|Oh, I see. I know little of my own
father, so I cannot truly understand.

$nMPID_双界リンダ|Ah...I'm sorry. I got caught up in
the mood.

$nMPID_サラ|No need to apologize. It is not as if
your unhappiness would make
me happy.

$nMPID_双界リンダ|Well... Even if you know nothing
about your father at all, you can
still remember him, in a way.

He lives on in whatever he left you—
your talent for magic, perhaps. Or
even just the color of your eyes.

$nMPID_サラ|I take no pleasure in my magic. It only
means my grandfather can use me
as a tool for his convenience.

But I suppose it's comforting to think
that when I look at myself, I am
seeing some part of my father.

$nMPID_双界リンダ|Well, there you go. We can call that
his gift to you.

$nMPID_サラ|It seems arbitrary to simply...decide
that. I don't even know if the thought
is particularly helpful.
$nMPID_双界リンダ|It is if you believe it!

$nMPID_サラ|I can see that you are trying to
cheer me up. Next time think
before you speak.

Still, I thank you. Your voice is
remarkably lovely.
